title: YouTube Stats Plugin Configuration
description: Configuration schema for the YouTube Stats plugin - displays YouTube channel statistics including subscriber count, total views, and channel name

enabled.description: Enable or disable the YouTube Stats plugin

channel_id.description: YouTube channel ID (e.g., UCxxxxx...). Find your channel ID at https://www.youtube.com/account_advanced

api_key.description: YouTube Data API v3 key (required - get one at https://console.cloud.google.com/apis/credentials). Store in config_secrets.json for security.
api_key.title: API Key

update_interval.description: Update interval in seconds. How often to fetch fresh channel statistics from YouTube API (60-3600 seconds)

display_duration.description: How long to display the channel stats on screen in seconds (5-60 seconds)

live_priority.description: Enable live priority takeover when plugin has live content
